title: Himachali Editor – Videography Service Website with Booking & Customer Login

requirements.text: Design a visually striking cinematic theme for the Himachali Editor website using a dark, moody color palette (deep blacks, warm golds, and mountain-inspired earthy tones), bold typography, and full-width hero sections. Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section uses a full-width cinematic layout with bold headline and tagline
Color palette consistently applies dark backgrounds, gold/amber accents, and earthy tones
Typography is bold and modern throughout all sections
Theme is consistent across landing page, pricing, and booking sections

requirements.text: Create a landing/home page for 'Himachali Editor' that includes a hero section with the brand name and tagline about videography shoot & editing services, a brief about section, and clear navigation to Pricing and Booking sections.

quotes: Create an website naming Himachali editor For videography shoot + editing service providing

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays 'Himachali Editor' as the brand name prominently
Hero section includes a tagline related to videography shoot & editing services
Navigation links to Pricing and Booking sections exist
Page is responsive on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Display a One-Time Services pricing section with the following four services and their prices: Normal Video Editing + Shoot (₹4,000), High Video Editing + Shoot (₹5,000), Car Delivery Shoot (₹2,500), Bike Delivery Shoot (₹2,000). Each card should show the service name, price, and a 'Book Now' button.
acceptanceCriteria: Four one-time service cards are displayed
Each card shows the correct service name and price in INR
A 'Book Now' button is present on each card
Section is clearly labeled as 'One-Time Services'

requirements.text: Display a Monthly Packages pricing section with three packages: Basic (8–12 videos, Normal Edit + Shoot, ₹12,000), Premium (10–15 videos, High Edit + Shoot, ₹15,000), Pro (10–15 videos, High Edit + Shoot + Social Media Management, ₹18,000). Each package card should show the package name, included deliverables, price, and a 'Subscribe' button. Visually highlight the Pro package as the most popular or recommended.

quotes: Basic package 8 to 12 videos normal edit+shoot = 12000
Premium package 10 to 15 videos high edit +shoot = 15000
Pro package 10 to 15 videos high edit + shoot + social media management = 18000

acceptanceCriteria: Three monthly package cards are displayed
Each card shows the correct package name, video count range, included services, and price
Subscribe button is present on each card
Pro package is visually differentiated (e.g., badge, highlighted border)
Section is clearly labeled as 'Monthly Packages'

requirements.text: Implement a customer authentication system using Internet Identity. Customers must be able to log in and log out. A unique customer profile/ID should be associated with their Internet Identity principal and stored in the backend.

quotes: Add online booking method with costumers id login

acceptanceCriteria: Login button is visible in the navigation header
Clicking Login triggers Internet Identity authentication
After login, the customer's name/ID is shown in the header
Logout option is available when logged in
Customer principal is stored and associated with their profile in the backend

requirements.text: Implement a backend data model and API for storing customer profiles. Each profile should include: principal ID, display name, email (optional), and registration timestamp.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores customer profiles keyed by Internet Identity principal
Profile creation is triggered on first login
Query function exists to retrieve a customer's own profile
Update function exists to update display name or email

requirements.text: Implement a backend data model and API for bookings. Each booking record should include: booking ID, customer principal, service or package name, selected date, status (pending/confirmed/completed), and booking timestamp. Provide functions to create a new booking and retrieve bookings for the logged-in customer.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores booking records with all required fields
createBooking function is callable by authenticated customers only
getMyBookings function returns only the calling customer's bookings
Booking IDs are unique and auto-generated

requirements.text: Implement an online booking form UI. When a logged-in customer clicks 'Book Now' or 'Subscribe' on any service or package, a booking modal or page should open pre-filled with the selected service/package name. The form should collect preferred date, optional notes, and submit to the backend booking API. Unauthenticated users should be prompted to log in before booking.

quotes: Add online booking method with costumers id login

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Book Now' or 'Subscribe' opens a booking form/modal
Selected service/package name is pre-filled in the form
Form collects preferred date and optional notes
Form submission calls the backend createBooking function
Success message shown after booking is created
Unauthenticated users see a prompt to log in before booking

requirements.text: Create a customer dashboard page accessible only when logged in. It should display the customer's booking history with service name, booking date, and status for each booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard is only accessible to logged-in customers
Dashboard lists all bookings made by the logged-in customer
Each booking entry shows service/package name, preferred date, and status
Empty state message shown when no bookings exist

constraints: Use Internet Identity as the sole authentication method — no external OAuth providers
All backend logic must reside in the single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Prices must be displayed in Indian Rupees (₹)
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Payment gateway integration (no actual online payments)
Admin dashboard for the service provider
Video upload or portfolio gallery functionality
SMS or email confirmation of bookings

required: Cinematic dark hero background with blurred mountain landscape and bokeh light streaks, suitable for a videography brand (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Abstract dark textured background with subtle film grain and warm gold tones for pricing section (pricing-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
Himachali Editor brand logo — golden camera icon with stylized mountain silhouette, minimal and modern on transparent background (logo.dim_300x100.png)
